item.title: Optimizing Brain Tumor Segmentation with MedNeXt: BraTS 2024 SSA and Pediatrics
item.description: MedNeXt, a novel model ensemble, optimizes brain tumor segmentation in diverse populations, achieving state-of-the-art results on the BraTS 2024 SSA and pediatric datasets.
